document.name: Family Movie Night- WC- The Cup
document.short_description:
🌟 Family Movie Night: World Cinema for Kids! 🌍🎬

Embark on a cinematic journey like never before with our Family Movie Night – an enchanting experience specially curated for the whole family!

Join us for an unforgettable evening filled with rare masterpieces from around the world, carefully selected to expand young minds and foster cultural curiosity in your little explorers.


Event Highlights:

-Expand Horizons with Universal Stories: Immerse your kids in a world of diverse artistic expression through rare curation of masterpieces for children.

-Foster Cultural Curiosity: Ignite curiosity about world cinema and encourage your little ones to explore the rich tapestry of global cultures through the magic of film.

-Quality Family Time: Every month, embark on a cinematic journey to a new country together, creating lasting memories and strengthening family ties.


Why Attend?

-Discover Hidden Gems: Watch movies that you might not have heard of before, carefully handpicked for their artistic superiority and engaging narratives.

-Artistically Superior Experience: Immerse your child in artistically superior films that stimulate their imagination and creativity.

-Safe Environment: Enjoy the movies in a secure and family-friendly environment, ensuring a worry-free experience for both kids and parents.


Don't miss this opportunity to create lasting memories with your family while exposing your kids to the wonders of world cinema.

Join us for Family Movie Night – where the magic of storytelling knows no bounds!

document.name: The Courtyard Baithak- Ghazal Night
document.short_description:
Ticket Includes Performance Only.


Exclusive gatherings, quiet strains of exquisite music, dedicated artists across selected genres - The Courtyard Baithak series promises a true classical musical experience.


The Courtyard Baithak series is curated by tabla wizard and prodigy Trilochan Kampli, who with his uncompromising standards in music, evokes the best from every artist that he invites to perform. We are bringing musicians and audiences together on a sublime musical journey.


Artist Bio

document.name: Movie Under The Stars- Top Gun
document.short_description:
About the movie:

After more than thirty years of service, military awards, medals and decorations for extraordinary heroism in combat, distinguished US Navy Captain Pete Mitchell, call sign Maverick, finds himself exactly where he belongs: pushing the limits as a top test pilot. Having spent years avoiding promotions after the events of Top Gun (1986), Maverick must now confront the ugly past and an uncertain future while tasked with training the next generation of elite fighter pilots for a nearly impossible suicide mission. As the veteran naval aviator prepares the brilliant graduates for the top-secret assignment, stretching the rules to the breaking point, Mitchell has to face an equally critical challenge: navigate through an uncomfortable relationship with a hotshot lieutenant holding a grudge. Can Maverick and his Top Guns perform a miracle, give the enemy hell, and come back home in one piece?



3 Course Menu:

TO BE Announced

document.name: Around the world in 9 plates

custom_questions.question: Number of vegetarians in the group
Number of non-veg in the group
Where did you hear about us?

document.short_description:
Cheese, the most ancient form of milk preservation, holds a significant place in local cuisines worldwide, particularly in regions with a rich history of livestock rearing. Its essence is deeply intertwined with its terroir, reflecting the cheese-making methods, maturation process, grazing pastures, and seasonal variations. At Käse, we cherish the exploration of places through their food, ingredients, cooking techniques, and stories of origin. Understanding the intricate nuances of cheese is paramount to us as we strive to recreate its essence. Our selection of 32 favorite cheeses, each with its unique story and flavor profile, will be narrowed down to 9 based on the seasonality of other produce we'll be pairing them with. Through these selections, we aim to share regional dishes and the cultural significance of cheeses, celebrating their place in the culinary fabric of our world.


About the Chef


﻿Chef Goku, trained at the Culinary Institute of America, boasts expertise in both culinary and pastry arts. With a background in renowned Michelin-starred establishments such as Junoon, Aureole, The Clock Tower, Rezdora, and Dominique in New York, as well as Blackbird in Chicago, Chef Goku has honed his skills to perfection. Returning to India, he has taken Chennai by storm with his innovative culinary creations under the brand Hygge By Chef Goku. Currently hosting pop-ups and curated dinners in Chennai, he also oversees pastry kitchens at Chokolat Culture and Maison Indulgence. His culinary repertoire spans global cuisines, including Italian, Korean, Japanese, Thai, Vietnamese, Filipino, Chinese, Ethiopian, Mexican, South American, Caribbean, American, French, and Indian cuisine. Outside the kitchen, Chef Goku indulges in fine wine, cocktails, music, and dance.

document.name: A Walk Through Khyber - 8 course set menu
document.short_description:
A Walk Through Khyber


Embark on a culinary odyssey through the vibrant tapestry of Khyber, where each dish narrates a tale of our ancestors and the legendary Silk Road. Immerse yourself in a one-of-a-kind 8-course set menu, meticulously crafted to encapsulate the essence of Khyber's rich culture and timeless flavors.


This is not merely a meal; it's a multi-sensory journey. Our menu honors the historical influences that have shaped our palate, drawing inspiration from eminent figures such as Genghis Khan and Babur. But it doesn't end with the food; we've curated every aspect, from music to decor, aromas, and textures, to offer you an immersive sensory experience. Step back in time nearly 500 years ago, as we reinterpret and celebrate the past in a contemporary light.


Pulse Hospitality x Treat


In 2020, Chef Pallavi and Chef Kartik united their culinary talents to establish Pulse Hospitality, specializing in crafting exclusive outdoor dining experiences. Now, after three successful years, they are preparing to host their very first supper club event. This noteworthy occasion is made even more special through a collaboration with Treat, an esteemed brand situated in Indiranagar, Bangalore, established in 1993 under the stewardship of Mr. Pramod Chaudhry. With its rich history spanning three decades, Treat brings a wealth of experience and expertise to this exciting partnership.

account_data.company_description: Where a small group of strangers come together for genuine conversations & spontaneous connections  over a curated meal. Guided by a host every Table is a mix of locals & newcomers sharing stories of their roots & dreams
